author: COMSOL
description: The model investigates the wave propagation in a photonic crystal that consists of GaAs pillars placed equidistant from each other. The photonic crystal structure is the same as the one used in the other photonic crystal model, but this example extracts the band diagram for the lowest bands of the crystal. It performs a nonlinear sweep of an eigenvalue analysis, using the nonlinear solver with an extra normalization equation for the eigenvalue.
label: bandgap_photonic_crystal.mph
name: root
